description: This file defines a React component called KanbanCard used for rendering individual task cards in a Kanban board interface. It includes helper functions for rendering badges (Pill), modal dialogs, and manages state for editing, modal visibility, and deletion confirmation. The component supports both compact inline view and expanded modal view with editing capabilities, including delete functionality with confirmation dialogs.

methods.name: Pill
methods.description: A helper React component that renders a styled badge (pill) based on the value and type, used for status, priority, and assignee indicators.

methods.name: Modal
methods.description: A React component that creates a portal modal overlay for displaying detailed or editable views of the card.

methods.name: getCardColorClass
methods.description: Determines the CSS class for the card based on its status and priority.

methods.name: openModal
methods.description: Prepares and opens the modal dialog, resetting fields to current card data.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Handles input changes in the edit form, updating the component's state.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Submits the edited card data, calling updateCard and closing edit mode.

methods.name: confirmDeleteCard
methods.description: Performs the deletion of the card, handling errors and showing toast notifications.

methods.name: getStatusDotColor
methods.description: Returns a color code for the status indicator dot based on the card's status.

methods.name: renderInlineCard
methods.description: Renders the compact inline view of the card.

methods.name: renderModalCard
methods.description: Renders the detailed modal view of the card, including editing and delete options.
